sentence_info.definition: A sentence is a group of words that conveys a complete thought or idea.

types_details.definition: A declarative sentence is a type of sentence that makes a statement or expresses an opinion.
An interrogative sentence is a type of sentence that asks a question.
An imperative sentence is a type of sentence that gives a command, request, or instruction.
An exclamatory sentence is a type of sentence that expresses strong emotion or excitement.
